question: The International Day for the Elimination of Sexual Violence in Conflict is observed on which day?
explanation: The International Day for the Elimination of Sexual Violence in Conflict is observed on June 19 across the world. It is observed to raise awareness of the need to put an end to conflict-related sexual violence, to honor the victims and survivors of sexual violence around the world. The theme for the year 2017 International Day for the Elimination of Sexual Violence in Conflict is "Preventing Sexual Violence Crimes through Justice and Deterrence".
